mapper.sql: id, dispatch_id, record_time, device_id, burl, surl, similarity, type, create_time
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.dispatch_id, a.record_time, a.device_id, a.burl, a.surl, a.similarity, a.type, a.create_time,
b.idcard, b.name, b.car, b.mac, b.notes
b.name
from t_dispatch_recognize a,
t_dispatch b where a.type = #{searchType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.dispatch_id = b.id
t_dispatch b where a.type = and type in(1,2) and a.dispatch_id = b.id
t_dispatch_white b where a.type = #{searchType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.dispatch_id = b.id
t_dispatch_alive b where a.type = #{searchType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.dispatch_id = b.id
and record_time between #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by record_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_dispatch_recognize
id,
dispatch_id,
record_time,
device_id,
burl,
surl,
similarity,
type,
create_time,

#{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_dispatch_recognize
dispatch_id = #{dispatchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
burl = #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surl = #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
similarity = #{similarity,jdbcType=REAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_dispatch_recognize set dispatch_id = #{dispatchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_time = #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, burl = #{burl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surl = #{surl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, similarity = #{similarity,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
